issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a new Titanium project with the Titanium create command
2. cd into that directory
3. Run the Titanium setup command

Actual result:

The following error is returned 
{code}
*Note* This is probably because this command is being run on non OSX computers

TypeError: Cannot read property 'certs' of undefined 0 [ 'TypeError: Cannot read property \'certs\' of undefined',
  '    at exports.run (C:\\Users\\tester\\AppData\\Roaming\\npm\\node_modules\\titanium\\lib\\commands\\setup.js:36:18)',
  '    at Object.exports.detect [as detect] (C:\\Users\\tester\\AppData\\Roaming\\npm\\node_modules\\titanium\\node_modules\\node-appc\\lib\\ios.js:18
{code}

Expected result:

The Titanium setup command runs succesfully
fields.summary: CLI - setup : When running the titanium setup command on Windows 7 and Ubuntu an error is returned "TypeError: Cannot read property 'certs' of undefined 0"
fields.environment:
Titanium CLI 3.0.3
Windows 7 and Ubuntu 10.04
Titanium SDK 3.0.0.v20121012174449

comments.body:
Tested with
CLI 3.0.6
SDK 3.0.0.v20121017192538
Win 7 and Linux
